animeDescription: A Matsue City collaboration anime with Eagle Talon. Yoshida book-ends the story as horror tales, both modern and historical, originated within the city are narrated by another person.
animeRelated: ['Alternative version: Himitsukessha Taka no Tsume Gaiden: Mukashi no Yoshida-kun', 'Other: Matsue Kankou Taishi Sanri ga Iku! Matsue Ghost Tour', 'Prequel: Heisei Matsue Kaidan']
